description: nQuant is a .net color quantizer that can dramatically reduce the size of images with little to no perceptible quality loss.
summary: nQuant is a .net color quantizer which produces high quality 256 color 8 bit PNG images. nQuant uses an algorithm adapted from adapts Xiaolin Wu's fast optimal color quantizer. nQuant often reduces the size of a 32 bit image to a size 3 times smaller than its original with quality surpassing what the standard C command line utilities produce.
author: Matt Wrock
